name: Zombie Missision
description:
Kill many zombies, use various weapons and earn many coins. A game where the objective is to kill several zombies with a knife, grenade, pistol and other weapons. Be the fastest, the most powerful and the best. The best players always win prizes.

Controls
  • Arrow keys to move
  • SPACE TO shoot
  • TAB get new weapon
  • G grenade
  • I increases player speed
HOW TO PLAY

Kill as many zombies as you can, get the boxes with weapon markings to switch weapons.
Get to the end of the round and kill the big boss. The big boss drops prizes.
Can you play?
